name: Navidrome
description: A modern, lightweight music server and streamer with compatibility for all Subsonic-compatible clients
author: deluan

form_fields.label: Log Level
form_fields.hint: Application log level for debugging (error, warn, info, debug, trace)

form_fields.label: Enable Artwork Precache
form_fields.hint: Enable automatic image pre-caching when new music is added

form_fields.label: Enable User Editing
form_fields.hint: Allow regular users to edit their profile and change passwords

form_fields.label: Enable Downloads
form_fields.hint: Enable the option to download music from the server

form_fields.label: Enable Sharing
form_fields.hint: Enable the sharing feature to create public links for music

form_fields.label: Enable Transcoding Config
form_fields.hint: Enable transcoding configuration in the UI (requires ffmpeg)

form_fields.label: Session Timeout
form_fields.hint: How long until idle web UI sessions are closed (e.g., 48h, 24h)

form_fields.label: Base URL
form_fields.hint: Base URL to configure Navidrome behind a proxy (e.g., /navidrome or https://music.example.com)

form_fields.label: Enable Favourites
form_fields.hint: Enable the ability to mark songs/albums as favorites (Heart/Loved)

form_fields.label: Enable Now Playing
form_fields.hint: Enable tracking what users are currently listening to

form_fields.label: Enable Scrobble History
form_fields.hint: Enable scrobble history tracking for Last.fm integrations

form_fields.label: Enable Star Rating
form_fields.hint: Enable 5-star ratings for songs and albums in the UI

form_fields.label: Enable Anonymous Data Collection
form_fields.hint: Allow Navidrome to send anonymous usage statistics to help improve the project

form_fields.label: Enable Last.fm Integration
form_fields.hint: Enable Last.fm integration for artist images and scrobbling

form_fields.label: Enable Spotify Integration
form_fields.hint: Enable Spotify integration (requires Client ID and Secret)

form_fields.label: Spotify Client ID
form_fields.hint: Your Spotify API Client ID for artist image retrieval

form_fields.label: Spotify Client Secret
form_fields.hint: Your Spotify API Client Secret for artist image retrieval

form_fields.label: Enable Deezer Integration
form_fields.hint: Enable Deezer integration for artist metadata and images

form_fields.label: Enable ListenBrainz
form_fields.hint: Enable ListenBrainz integration for scrobbling

form_fields.label: Enable ReplayGain
form_fields.hint: Enable ReplayGain options in the UI for volume normalization

form_fields.label: Transcoding Cache Size
form_fields.hint: Size of transcoding cache (e.g., 100MB, 1GB). Set to 0 to disable

form_fields.label: Image Cache Size
form_fields.hint: Size of image cache for artwork (e.g., 100MB, 500MB). Set to 0 to disable
